# Admixer

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="admixer"
  data-sizes="[[300,250]]"
  data-zone="2eb6bd58-865c-47ce-af7f-a918108c3fd2"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, see [Admixer documentation](http://docs.admixer.net/3/en/topic/amp-configuration).

### Required parameters

-   `data-zone`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-sizes`
